BdkPdfDDalitzInc.rdl

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkPdfDDalitzInc.rdl,v 1.13 2006/06/30 02:05:45 fwinkl Exp $
00005  * Description:
00006  *  Wrapper for an incoherent sum of BW's
00007  *  The PDF is defined as
00008  *  ((pdfRhoM + _fracRhoP*pdfRhoP) + _fracRho0*pdfRho0) + _fracNonres*pdf2Dpoly
00009  *
00010  * History:
00011  *   18 Oct 2005, created, Abi soffer
00012  *
00013  * Copyright (C) 2005 Colorado State University and SLAC
00014  *****************************************************************************/
00015
